title: Apple frangipane tart
description: With a base of crushed biscuits, rather than pastry, this tart is quick to make – no need for any rolling out or baking blind. The apple and almond go so well together too. Make it a day ahead then just reheat it when you are ready to serve.Equipment: You will need a 20cm/8in round, loose-bottomed fluted tart tin with 3-4cm/1¼-1½ in sides.
